segments.text: how did you do on your BELTS exam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: fantastic ! I got an overall score of eight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's excellent ! Have you received your conditional offers yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . I'm just waiting until I officially get admitted to the university with a conditional offer to apply for my visa .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you know where the visa office is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it's just near the Dong Si Shi Tiao subway stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's not too far away . Do you think I'll get a visa ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you ever gone abroad before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I've been to Tailband , Egypt , and Japan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you ever been denied a visa before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's good . Are you planning on immigrating to another country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no , I want to come back to China after I graduate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's exactly what the visa officers want to hear . Do you have enough money for tuition and room and board ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've received a full scholarship , so I won't need any other money to live off while I'm studying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you have a very good chance of getting a visa . I can help you prepare for the visa interview if you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: that's be great . The more prepared I am , the better .
segments.speaker: S2
